text: The Borough of Congleton (or Congleton Borough) is in Cheshire, England. The towns of Alsager, Congleton, Middlewich and Sandbach are in the Borough. It was part of the second tier of local government. It was replaced by Cheshire East in April 2009. ==Religion== The percentage of people of each religion in the borough. People stating religion as: *Christian: 81.46% *Muslim: 0.17% *Buddhist: 0.12% *Hindu: 0.11% *Jewish: 0.06% *Sikh: 0.04% *Other religions: 0.16% *No religion: 11.46% *Religion not stated: 6.43% ==References== == Other websites == *Homepage Category:English boroughs Category:Geography of Cheshire
title: Borough of Congleton
